item.title: Installation
item.description: Coco Server User Guide # Run Coco Server with Docker Manual install Coco Server 1. Quick Start (Recommended for Most Users) # This method is the simplest way to get Coco Server running. It uses Docker-managed volumes, which handles data persistence automatically without requiring manual directory setup on your host machine. Command: docker run -d \ --name cocoserver \ -p 9000:9000 \ -v data:/app/easysearch/data \ -v config:/app/easysearch/config \ -v logs:/app/easysearch/logs \ -e EASYSEARCH_INITIAL_ADMIN_PASSWORD="coco-server" \ infinilabs/coco:0.
